publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-230.1 Tommy Sheridan: European Structural Funds—As an amendment to motion (S1M-230) in the name of Mr Jack McConnell, insert at end "but regrets the omission of most of South Lanarkshire and South Ayrshire from the Objective 2 map, despite having a greater claim than Fife and the Borders who are included."
